website_summaries.verdict: Easily the second best phone on our list, out-shined by the S20 and more costly than the S9.
pros: Dual front camera setup produces high quality selfie images
The built-in Android photo editing app is flexible for creating different effects and results
cons: Reports of the Samsung version of Android being filled with bloatware apps

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great seller.

This product was exactly as advertised with all the specs. Came with a travel charger, plastic case, headphones and most importantly an unlocked phone.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy A8 (2018) SM-A530F/DS Factory Unlocked DUAL SIM 64GB/4GB Ram 5.6" Screen, 16MP Rear Camera + Dual Frontal Camera 16MP+8MP, IP68, 4G LTE International Version No Warranty (Gold)
product_meta.description: Samsung's Galaxy A8 SM-A530F specifications and features: this is a 5.6"(142.0mm) device with a FHD + 2220 x 1080 screen resolution. The phone is powered by the Exynos 7885 soc with a 2.2GHz Dual + 1.6GHz Hexa configuration. Memory is 4GB, with the device offering 64GB internal storage and up to 256GB of external memory. The Galaxy A8 features Accelerometer, Barometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gyro Sensor and Geomagnetic Sensor. Notable features include MST technology (Samsung Pay) Accelerometer, Barometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Hall Sensor, Proximity Sensor, RGB Light Sensor. The device measures 149.2 x 70.6 x 8.4mm and weighs 172g.
feature_bullets: Display: 5.6 inch FHD 1080 x 2220 pixels, Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 64B ROM, 4GB RAM, microSD, up to 256GB (dedicated slot), Android 7.1.1 (Nougat), Finger Print Sensor, 16MP Main Camera, Dual: 16 MP + 8 MP Front Camera, Exynos 7885, Octa-core.
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.

Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all countries: 2G: GSM: 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - SIM 1 & SIM 2 (dual-SIM model only), 3G: HSDPA: 850 / 900 / 1700(AWS) / 1900 / 2100, LTE: band 1(2100), 2(1900), 3(1800), 4(1700/2100), 5(850), 7(2600), 8(900), 12(700), 13(700), 17(700), 18(800), 19(800), 20(800), 26(850), 28(700), 38(2600), 40(2300), 41(2500), 66(1700/2100).
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
The box contains: Your new device, USB cable, Earphones, Charger (may be foreign), Documentation.
